strings.Value: "You're right. Octavia and I are very close."
"You're right. Regongar and I are very close."
"There's no place in my heart for anyone but you."

"I couldn't help but notice you have quite a... close relationship with someone from our entourage. I feel it's... let's say obscene, considering everything we've said between us." {n}Valerie looks at you, folding her arms across her chest.{/n}
{n}A thin smile appears on Valerie's face.{/n} "Oh, just that? In that case I won't keep you from having fun."
{n}Valerie grows pensive.{/n} "I'm sorry you decided to inform me about it only after I raised this question." {n}Valerie turns away.{/n}
{n}Valerie tilts her head.{/n} "Are you sure? I think you should clarify the situation with those who... who are close to you. And make sure everyone knows where things stand."
